headline: Amazon Web Services to provide US government agencies with up to $1 billion in discounts
summary: Amazon Web Services has agreed to provide U.S. government agencies with up to $1 billion in discounts for cloud adoption, modernization and training through the end of 2028, the U.S. General Services Administration said Thursday. The agency said the agreement with the unit of Amazon.com "will accelerate large-scale IT transformation across government and spur AI innovation."

headline: Rebelution Names Growth Expert Edo Sacagiu as Advisor to Growvana
summary: CHICAGO, August 07, 2025--Rebelution, a leader in marketplace enablement, has appointed Edo Sacagiu as an advisor to Growvana, its advanced e-commerce growth platform. Growvana combines deep marketplace analytics, working-capital solutions, and operational tools that help brands and manufacturers scale faster and more profitably across leading retail channels through direct vendor and supplier relationships.
